body.name: Lucid 5 Inch Firm Gel Memory Foam Mattress Twin— Gel Infusion—Hypoallergenic Bamboo Charcoal—Breathable Cover,White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 37 mins
features: GENERAL NOTE: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your mattress to regain its full shape, any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room; the expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding
FIRM FEEL: This Lucid mattress includes 1 inch of ventilated gel memory foam and 4 inches of bamboo charcoal infused support foam for a firm feel ideal for stomach and back sleepers

MEMORY FOAM: Layers of responsive memory foam provides a soft support, containing more comfort than a traditional innerspring mattress; memory foam layers also contains ventilation holes for easy air transfer for your bed.Top:Polyester
GEL INFUSION: Top layer of the mattress contains ventilated memory foam infused with cooling gel, capturing and dissipating heat to help regulate body temperature for a more comfortable sleep climate

PLACE IN ANY ROOM: This mattress is perfect for any occasion; great for stomach, and back sleepers, this memory foam mattress fits well in an RV or bunk bed and works well with any slatted bed frame, platform bed, or adjustable base

MATTRESS IN A BOX: Good sleep can’t wait. This is why we’ve designed all our Lucid mattresses to be compressed, rolled, and shipped in one box for easy delivery and setup; simply unbox, unroll, and wait 24-72 hours for the mattress to expand
body.description: At Lucid, we make beds for the whole family—because when you wake up feeling your best, your family gets the best version of you too. When looking for a firm support, the Lucid 5 Inch Firm Gel Memory Foam Mattress is the way to go. Made to perfectly fit, the Twin mattress will match with any Twin bed frame and is great for an RV, bunk bed, or child’s bed and is perfect for side, stomach, and back sleepers. A 1-inch layer of ventilated gel memory foam and a 4-inch layer of high-density support foam gives a firm feel. The gel memory foam layer helps regulate body temperature. Plus, the bamboo charcoal infusion helps keep your beds smelling fresh thanks to its natural hypoallergenic properties. Comfort awaits. .

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: DO NOT REMOVE OR WASH COVER. Spot clean only: Vacuum your mattress, sprinkle some baking soda on it. Use a scrub brush to gently rub the powder into the mattress and leave it for 10 minutes or so and vacuum the excess powder. Do not wash. Do not use bleach. Do not machine dry. Do not iron. Do not dry clean. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress for guest bed or toddler!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as my 2.5year olds first big boy bed. It’s perfect! No bad smells, it fluffed up right away, and was easy to open.Mine fluffed up to size instantly. I was hesitant to buy this based on reviews but mine was perfect.No one has slept on it yet, so I can’t speak for comfort... but I did lay down on it and it was very comfy. Is perfect size, stiffness, and comfort for a toddler. Would recommend and purchase again.It is thin, but it’s the size it shows when purchasing. If you’re in need of a thin but comfortable and reasonably priced bed... this is it.Not sure on what the mattress is made of, or if it is made of what the description says, but it’s still a great mattress.UPDATE: 4/27/2021 - this mattress is amazing. Fits perfectly in the bed frame I had made for my son. He slept amazing on it last night! Absolutely love! See last 2 images!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got our kiddo a loft bed and realized our current mattress was too thick/tall for the guard rails to be effective, this mattress is a great price and my kiddo says is comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for my bad back
reviews.reviewText: Like many of my fellow bipedal hominids of a certain age, I've developed a degenerated lumbar disc and, being a side sleeper, have found I need a very firm mattress to keep my spine from bending and pinching through the night. I'm taking the time to write this up in hopes it's of use to others with bad backs struggling to find a good night sleep and eliminate the source of their pain.My lower back pain was getting progressively worse for several years until I realized the problem might be the "firm" $2K mattress I was sleeping on. I went camping for a week, sleeping on just a 2" memory foam topper on the ground; pain started to subside immediately. I've since tried out a couple other "firm" mattresses in the $2-3K range and have come to the opinion that there's no such thing as a mattress that is both thick and also firm. The more material you add, the more sag you're going to get. Period. Companies would obviously rather sell you a thicker, more expensive mattress, but if you want a truly firm mattress it must be thin.This LUCID mattress is unusually firm; firmer than I had expected and firmer than I had even hoped for. It's definitely not as plush as thicker options. But it is GREAT for my back, and starting the day pain-free is the most important thing. It was a little too firm for my partner, so we added a 1" latex topper which is nearly as supportive and quite a bit more comfortable. I would recommend this combo.The only setup I've found that is better for my back is the aforementioned firm 2" memory foam mattress topper right on the floor. That's the setup I use for car camping and I never sleep better than on one of those. It's perfect in terms of both support and comfort, at least for me @ 5'8", 150lb. The downside is I've found those toppers only last a couple years of daily use before softening to the point your hips start to feel the ground beneath. If you try the topper-only strategy, make sure it's high-density as they're not all the same. I got mine at Costco.The reason I gave this item 4 stars instead of 5 is that they obnoxiously list it as 60x80" (true queen) but both the box and tag list its true size, which is 59"x79". So the description is misleading (perhaps even deliberately so, as getting those numbers right would have been a trivial task). I'd rather pay 3% more for a mattress that fits both my bed frame and my sheets. 1" matters when you're sharing a queen. I ended up returning the mattress for this reason alone despite it otherwise being a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, A Full Night's Sleep
reviews.reviewText: Got this during Prime Day to replace a couple of foam toppers I have been using on a hand-me-down traditional full mattress and box springs set that is still too hard for my taste despite being broken down. The two toppers were about 5 inches total of just "memory foam" and weren't really getting the job done. I am 62, overweight, and have arthritis in many joints, including my hips. I sleep mainly on my left side but at times, my left hip would hurt and I would end up on my back during the night. This caused my back to hurt and my legs to go numb. Not to mention apnea episodes with multiple wakings during the night.To be honest, I really didn't pay much attention to the inches and just saw the good price - got mine for a lot less than what it's going for now. When I got it and saw that it was only 5 inches, I worried. Especially when I read on the company website that it was designed to transition kids from the crib to a full size bed. I was afraid it wouldn't be firm enough to give the support I needed. Happy to say that assessment was very, very wrong.I got it out of the box at around 11:00 am and it was fully decompressed by the time I was ready for bed 12 hours later. There was no strong smell that I could detect and I am very sensitive to smells. It's firm enough to keep my hip from hitting bottom yet cushy enough to keep me pain free. I woke up on my side, exactly as I had gone to sleep. Basically, I slept like a rock and woke up feeling a lot better than I usually do.I would definitely recommend this mattress if you are looking for a replacement. However, considering how the full mattress is suddenly going for more than twice what I paid for mine during Prime Day, you might want to check around for a better price if you're looking for a full.By the way, this mattress works just fine atop a traditional mattress and box springs. I even have another foam topper between the older mattress and this new one but only because it would have been a royal pain to have gotten rid of the topper first.

reviews.reviewText: I thought I would be able to use this without a box spring but it just doesn't work if the bed has slats. It's pretty thin but surprisingly not uncomfortable. It's ok for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort is definitely there
reviews.reviewText: Firm but not rock solid which is pretty alright since I'm a side sleeper. Setup was easy, just had to let the bed sit for 2 days without using it in a well ventilated room for it to expand all the way. It definitely helped straighten out my sleep pattern as well as fixing any lower back pain I had

Purchased 2 mattress for a day bed. Have been sleeping on them during the remodel of my main bedroom. Truly comfortable. However firm means firm not hard. Also slight panic the box was printed XL but the mattress was regular length. I price shop prior to my purchase and it is a great value.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto aunke no es hecho en Mx. Compre El queen size en 4mil
reviews.reviewText: El grosor si es de 13 CMS. Compre queen size porke en buen fin lo pusieron a precio de matrim. Cheken El tamaño porke tienen uno q es de 150 por 200 CMS, es mas grande q El tamaño MexicanoLa caja llego maltratada pero el colchon enrollado no tuvo problema. Lo deje 24 hrs sin usar ya salido de su bolsa y recuperó muy bien su tamaño indicado.Hasta ahora llevo una semana sin problemas. Mi base es plana entonces se siente muy firme pero no molesta. Mi pareja es llenita y si le kitó Los Dolores de cuello y/o cintura. Es fresco y no se siente el movimiento de ambos al dormir.Recomendable por precio solo q al ser extranjero no se si tenga garantia.Si no hago un update despues kiere decir q todo va muy bien++++++Update - llevo ya dos meses c él y sus formas siento q no se recuperan del todo bien, por lo q lo giré al primer mes p dejar q se recupere. Aun asi es cómodo y muy suave, me permite dormir de panza o normal sobre espalda.+ No es cómodo para leer si pesas mas de 80k, te hunde el trasero y t cansa. En general no lo recomiendo para gente pesada, pues se hindira y chocará c tu base+ No es cómodo p la actividad de pareja!!, porke es delgado y de repente chocan tus rodillas c la base (por su altura de 13 cms)+ Sin embargo al dormir, efectivamente no transmite el movimiento d tu pareja+ En realidad es una excelente opc pues es ligero para moverlo al cambiar las sàbanas, lo puede hacer la mujer sola aun c el tamaño queen+Es fresco y no sudas, y no es frio en tiempo de invierno (dic-feb zona centro mx)+ Ayuda definitivamente a no tener dolores de cuello. Y a mi pareja se le kitaron los dolores de cintura tambn+ Lo usamos c sabanas de algodón, por tanto en conjunto si brinda descanso y es de las opc mas económicas aki en Amz! Recomendable!!+ Trae funda de cierre para lavar la cubierta+ No es frio en invierno (lo probamos en zona montañosa)+ no recomendable usarlo en bases de tablones, se rekiere una plana por lo delgado del colchon para q no se deforme+ Es una lástima q no manejen el tamaño KING en MX, pues keria compralo en esta misma altura.

* El colchón llegó en 4 días, aún cuando se mencionaba en el rastreo del paquete que podría tardarse hasta 17 días. En este sentido, mis felicitaciones por la rapidez del envío.* El colchón viene dentro de una caja de cartón, envuelto en plástico, enrollado y sellado al vacío. Quitar la caja puede ser complicado si no tienes apoyo de otra persona y los plásticos deben quitarse con mucho cuidado con la navaja que viene incluida en la caja. Al momento de desembalar y desenrollar el colchón, éste viene muy delgado. Déjalo reposar unas horas (yo esperé unas 10 horas aproximadamente) y se inflará solo, poco a poco.* El colchón es comodísimo. Es de firmeza media, por lo que considero que es adecuado para todo tipo de personas. Yo puedo dormir boca arriba y de costado en él sin ningún problema. Esto lo comento porque aún cuando Lucid lo vende recomendando su uso en niños, la verdad es que yo sí he dormido muy bien, con mis 25 años de edad.* El colchón es de memory foam en su mayoría, así que se hunde cómodamente donde te acuestas/sientas (si no te agrada la sensación de hundimiento, el colchón no es para ti), y cuando te levantas puedes ver como el colchón recupera su forma, por lo que siempre se sentirá como nuevo. Llevo 1 mes con el colchón y sigo teniendo la misma experiencia cómoda (actualizaré la reseña cuando esto ya no sea así).* El colchón tiene 12.7 centímetros (5 pulgadas) de alto para ser precisos (no 13 centímetros, como dice la descripción del producto) y eso lo convierte en un colchón liviano, facil de mover y cargar. Derivado de su altura y facilidad de movimiento, decidí ponerlo encima de mi antiguo colchón sin ningún problema.* Alivió mi dolor de espalda pero de manera muy leve, por lo que si sufres de problemas serios o graves de cuello o espalda, este colchón no es tu mejor opción. Mejor opta por un colchón ortopédico.En general, un buen colchón: económico y cómodo como cualquier otro colchón de memory foam.
Creí que por el grosor no sería todo lo que esperaba, pero superó mis expectativas. Es muy cómodo y firme. Compraré otros dos en tamaño individual.
Es muy suave, no se deforma, buen colchón ya que lo usa una persona de la 3ra. edad misma que indica que está a gusto con él.
